event.title: Product/Project Manager Panel
event.description: Hear from IGT professionals about their career paths, how a CS degree can fit into these roles, and enjoy a networking session with light refreshments.

event.title: Murder Mystery
event.description: Join us for a thrilling murder mystery event where you can put your detective skills to the test and enjoy an evening of suspense and fun.

event.title: LeetCode Practice
event.description: Join us for a session of LeetCode practice where you can improve your coding skills and prepare for technical interviews.
